panels.description: No. of 4xx requests in the range selected above

targets.expr: sum by (job) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", job="$application", pod=~"$pod", uri!~".*actuator.*", status=~"4.."}[$__range]))

panels.title: HTTP 4xx

panels.description: No. of 5xx requests in the range selected above

targets.expr: sum by (job) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", job= "$application", pod=~"$pod", uri!~".*actuator.*", status=~"5.."}[$__range]))

panels.title: HTTP 5xx

panels.description: No. of requests in 5 minute range

targets.expr:
sum(topk(1, sum by (pod,container) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",container="$application", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[$__range])))) by (container)
-
sum(bottomk(1, sum by (pod,container) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",container="$application", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[$__range])))) by (container)
